name: Chef McDang
bio: Chef McDang is a renowned Thai chef, television personality, and author. Known for his expertise in Thai cuisine, he has dedicated his career to promoting Thai culinary traditions worldwide.

name: Chef Ian Kittichai
bio: Chef Ian Kittichai is a celebrated Thai chef, restaurateur, and cookbook author. With a passion for blending traditional Thai flavors with modern techniques, he has earned international acclaim.

name: Chef Bo Songvisava
bio: Chef Bo Songvisava is a prominent Thai chef known for her focus on sustainability and organic ingredients. She co-owns the highly acclaimed Bo.lan restaurant in Bangkok.

name: Chef Bee Satongun
bio: Chef Bee Satongun is a Thai chef celebrated for her authentic and innovative Thai dishes. She co-founded the Michelin-starred restaurant Paste in Bangkok.

name: Chef Chumpol Jangprai
bio: Chef Chumpol Jangprai is a well-known Thai chef and culinary ambassador. He is committed to preserving traditional Thai cooking techniques and sharing them with the world.

name: Chef Nooror Somany Steppe
bio: Chef Nooror Somany Steppe is a pioneering Thai chef and founder of the Blue Elephant restaurant and cooking school. She is known for her dedication to Thai culinary heritage and education.
